Title: 14.2 Loadable Function Reference
Description:
This aggregate function updates the firewall group profile
              cache through a SELECT
              statement on the
              firewall-database.firewall_groups
              table. It requires the
              FIREWALL_ADMIN privilege.

Press CTRL+C to copy SELECT read_firewall_groups('g', 'RECORDING', 'fwuser@localhost')
FROM mysql.firewall_groups;
